Method Documentation

- (void) cancelCommand

Cancel the current command

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesMainThread).

- (ConnStatusType) connect

Connect or reconnect synchronously

- (BOOL) connectAsync

Connect or reconnect asynchronously. The delegate is required to respond to some related messages

+ (PGTSConnection *) connection

Returns an autoreleased connection object

- (void) dataAvailable

Called when data is available from the libpq socket

- (void) disconnect

Disconnect from the database

- (id) disconnectedCopy

Construct a similiar connection object without actually connecting to the database.

- (int) endCopyAndAccept2: (BOOL)  accept
errorMessage: (NSString *)  localErrorMessage
messageWhenDone: (BOOL)  messageWhenDone 

Finish the COPY command

Parameters
acceptAccept the copying
errorMessageCustom error message, may be nil
messageWhenDoneWhether to send the results to the delegate

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesWorkerThread).

- (void) endWorkerThread

End the worker thread

- (PGTSResultSet *) executeQuery: (NSString *)  queryString

Execute the query. Block until the result is available. Multiple queries can be sent but the result is returned only for the last successful one.

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesMainThread).

- (void) finishConnecting

Add the connection to the shared connection pool and send user specified initial SQL commands

- (void) handleNotice: (NSString *)  message

Handle NOTICEs from PostgreSQL This is not the same thing as PostgreSQL notifications.

+ (BOOL) hasSSLCapability

Returns YES if OpenSSL was linked at compile time

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (NSArray *) pendingResultSets

Block and retrieve all pending results If no command is active, nil will be returned

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesWorkerThread).

- (PGconn *) pgConnection

The connection object from libpq

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) retrieveResultsAndSendToDelegate

Retrieve the pending results and send them to the delegate

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesWorkerThread).

- (int) sendCopyData2: (NSData *)  data
packetSize: (int)  packetSize
messageWhenDone: (BOOL)  messageWhenDone 

Methods associated with the COPY command

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesWorkerThread).

- (void) sendDispatchStatusToDelegate: (int)  status
forQuery: (NSString *)  queryString 

Send query dispatch status to the delegate Afterwards collect the results and send them as well

- (void) sendFinishedConnectingMessage: (ConnStatusType)  status
reconnect: (BOOL)  reconnected 

Notify the delegate about connection having been made or the attempt having failed

- (int) sendQuery2: (NSString *)  queryString
messageDelegate: (BOOL)  messageDelegate 

Send the query without retrieving the result The caller must retrieve the result afterwards. This will not be enforced by the framework

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesWorkerThread).

- (int) sendQuery: (NSString *)  queryString

Send the query Block only to make sure that the query was successfully dispatched. The delegate is messaged when the result is available.

Provided by category PGTSConnection(QueriesMainThread).

- (void) sendResultToDelegate: (PGTSResultSet *)  result

Send results to the delegate

- (void) setConnectionDictionary: (NSDictionary *)  userDict
See also
PGTSConstants.h for keys

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) setConnectionString: (NSString *)  aString

Set the connection string directly

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (BOOL) setConnectionURL: (NSURL *)  url

Connection variables.

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) setDatabaseInfo: (PGTSDatabaseInfo *)  anObject

Make a weak reference to the given object

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) setOverlooksFailedQueries: (BOOL)  aBool

Set the framework to call PGTSConnection:receivedResultSet: instead of PGTSConnection:receivedError:

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) startListening: (id)  anObject
forNotification: (NSString *)  notificationName
selector: (SEL)  aSelector 

Send a LISTEN query and register an object to receive notifications from this connection

Parameters
anObjectThe observer
aSelectorThe method to be called upon notification. It should take one parameter the type of which is NSNotification
- (ConnStatusType) status

Connection status

Provided by category PGTSConnection(MiscAccessors).

- (void) stopListening: (id)  anObject

Remove an object as the observer of any notifications

- (void) stopListening: (id)  anObject
forNotification: (NSString *)  notificationName 

Remove an object as the observer of notifications with the given name An UNLISTEN query is also sent if the object is the only observer for the given notification

- (void) updateConnectionStatus

Set the connection status after we have made the connection

- (BOOL) workerPollConnectionResetting: (BOOL)  reset

Connect or reconnect to the database

- (void) workerThreadMain: (NSConditionLock *)  threadStartLock

Run loop for the worker thread
